column2: Yes, it’s safe to buy this pullback in stocks. And if you got frightened Monday and sold, which was admittedly a scary day for many investors, get back in. Here are three reasons why, followed by three stocks to consider.
column4: It’s safe to dip your toes in the stock market — here are three companies to consider, including one disrupter

column2: Teradyne Inc.'s first-quarter financial guidance fell short of Wall Street projections, sending shares down nearly 20% in after-hours trading to $115.03.
column4: Teradyne stock plunges nearly 20% after earnings guidance misses
